page.title: 15LEISURE IN WOOBURN GREEN
page.content: In the parish of Wooburn Green there are varied forms of recreation.Sports clubs are-Badminton,Football,Cricket and Tennis.For younger children there are Brownies,Cubs,2 Youth Clubs and a Toddlers Club.Older children can attend Scouts or Guides.For adults there is an Operatic Society,Housewifes'Register,3 Social Clubs,2 Political Associations,a Ladies Circle,a Resident's Association, a Womens'Institute and a Parent-Teacher Association.There is an annual festival and a choir called the Wooburn Singers. There is woodland for walking and play, and a large public park with the River Wye running through.There is fishing in the river.There are 2 Church halls and a School hall for social functions. There are 6 public houses where food is served.
